roleset.name: build/create roughly

example.name: creation and attribute
example.text: The bailout was cobbled [*]together over the weekend, with officials from the Federal Reserve Board, Securities and Exchange Commission, Comptroller of the Currency and Treasury as well as the options exchanges.
example.arg: with officials from the Federal Reserve Board, Securities and Exchange Commission, Comptroller of the Currency and Treasury as well as the options exchanges.

example.name: creation and start state
example.text: Mr. Van de Kamp is the one who [*T*] collected the plans from the various radical environmental groups and cobbled them into a single unwieldy initiative to be placed on the ballot for election on Nov. 6, 1990.
example.arg: into a single unwieldy initiative to be placed on the ballot for election on Nov. 6, 1990.

example.name: creation and start state, different syntax
example.text: Mr. Van de Kamp is the one who [*T*] collected the plans from the various radical environmental groups and cobbled a single unwieldy initiative to be placed on the ballot for election on Nov. 6, 1990 out of them.
example.arg: a single unwieldy initiative to be placed on the ballot for election on Nov. 6, 1990

roleset.note: COBBLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cobble' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from cobble.01-v predicate notes)
